thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Infogem Technologies' shares to halt trade pending placement plan
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Shenzhen Infogem Technologies' shares to halt trade pending placement plan | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Infogem Technologies' shares to halt trade pending placement plan
text:
Oct 14 Shenzhen Infogem Technologies Co Ltd
* Says its shares to halt trading from Oct 15 pending share private placement plan
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1hDXiNd
Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
